titles: Buffalo shooting: Ten dead in racially motivated attack at New York state store
descriptions: An 18-year-old is charged over the New York state attack, which is being investigated as a racial hate crime.

titles: Buffalo shooting: 'Bodies were everywhere'
descriptions: Eyewitnesses describe shock and disbelief after a gunman shot 10 people dead in New York state.

titles: Ukraine war: Finland confirms Nato bid despite Putin warning
descriptions: President Niinisto called the move - a response to Russia invading Ukraine - a "historic day".

titles: Eurovision 2022: Ukraine wins, while the UK's Sam Ryder comes second
descriptions: Ukraine's Kalush Orchestra triumphs, while Sam Ryder gives the UK its best result since 1998.

titles: Eurovision win brings 'incredible happiness' to Ukraine
descriptions: Public support helped push Kalush Orchestra and their song Stefania on to win with 631 points.

titles: Somalia's presidential election: Where just 329 people vote
descriptions: Only MPs, voting in a heavily fortified zone, will decide on who will lead the troubled country.

titles: Saudi Aramco: Oil giant sees profits jump as prices surge
descriptions: The state-owned Saudi Aramco is currently the world's most valuable company due to soaring oil prices.

titles: Kenya elections 2022: William Ruto picks Rigathi Gachagua as running mate
descriptions: William Ruto, a frontrunner in this year's presidential election, picks businessman Rigathi Gachagua.

titles: Abortion rights rallies held around the US
descriptions: Pro-choice supporters are concerned that the Supreme Court could overturn the legal right to abortion.

titles: Delhi office fire: Dozens killed as fire sweeps through building
descriptions: Most of those inside were women, leaving families frantically searching for news of their fate.

titles: Shireen Abu Aqla: UN condemns killing of Al Jazeera reporter
descriptions: Shireen Abu Aqla was shot dead in disputed circumstances in the occupied West Bank.

titles: Afghanistan face veil decree: 'It feels like being a woman is a crime'
descriptions: Afghan women speak out against compulsory male chaperones and new mandate to wear all-covering veils.

titles: Her father went to prison - so she went to law school
descriptions: Her father's incarceration on non-violent drug crimes inspired Teeanna Brisco to go to law school.

titles: 'I searched for my sister for 30 years, but Covid took her from me'
descriptions: As a child Steve Ellis uncovered a family secret, 60 years later it led to an unexpected friendship.

titles: Australia election 2022: Are Australia's refugee releases an election ploy?
descriptions: As refugees detained for years are abruptly released, some think the upcoming election is the reason.

titles: Nova Scotia shooting: First-hand accounts heard in probe of Canada tragedy
descriptions: A probe into Canada's worst mass shooting has revealed new details about killer and police response.

titles: Eurovision 2022: Highlights of Ukraine's winning night
descriptions: Ukraine won the Eurovision song contest 2022, with the UK coming second, its best result since 1998.

titles: Fleeing Syria 10 years on: 'We cried all the way to Jordan'
descriptions: A family looks back after a decade living in the world's largest Syrian refugee camp.

titles: Violence at Al Jazeera journalist's funeral procession
descriptions: Police with riot gear hit mourners, saying they were pelted with stones, as crowds carry her coffin.

titles: Custom-made brace helps heal baby giraffe
descriptions: Vets in San Diego, California, came up with a creative solution to treat a young calf's limb disorder.

titles: The Ukrainian refugee schoolgirl learning fast in the UK
descriptions: Ukrainian refugee Marharyta, nine, is learning English as she waits to start school in Manchester.
